title: Understanding Cell Protection
text: To unlock cells for specific users, you need to adjust the permissions for those cells. This involves using a specific feature in Excel.

title: Locating the Feature
text: The feature to allow specific users to edit certain ranges is found in a particular tab and group in Excel. Think about where you would manage changes and permissions.

hintAnswer: Find "allow users to edit ranges" (review tab|changes group)
title: Using the Review Tab
text: In Excel, go to the Review tab. Look for a group that deals with changes and permissions.
choices: Find "allow users to edit ranges" (review tab
share the worksheet with those users
they can unlock cells for themselves
